snippet: Narendra Modi, a front-runner for prime minister who campaigned as a technocrat but rose as an ideologue, has won admirers among the disillusioned working and middle classes.
abstract: First of India's 814 million registered voters begin casting ballots in remote northeast in country's Parliamentary elections; front-runner Narendra Modi is hoping his image as a technocrat will overshadow his past as a hardliner and appeal to electorate that is tired of dynastic rulers and corrupt lawmakers.
lead_paragraph: Narendra Modi, a front-runner for prime minister who campaigned as a technocrat but rose as an ideologue, has won admirers among the disillusioned working and middle classes.

headline.main: Wish for Change Animates Voters in India Election
headline.print_headline: Wish for Change Animates Voters in India Election
